title: Ticket #411: Publish automated magic number web page
description:
We have an internal web page of internal numbers used by Condor at http://www.cs.wisc.edu/condor/developers/numbers.html . This is handy when reading log files, and it's faster than searching the code for the number.

  1. Now that the source is public, we might as well make the page public

  2. The page should be automatically built from the source, so it doesn't get out of date (it's currently missing some shadow exit codes)
remarks:
This appears to have been completed.

2010-Apr-28 10:00:24 by jfrey:
I just updated the page manually. There's no automatic update system in place.
creator: adesmet
